snippet.title: Invizimals Shadow Zone PSP trailer
snippet.description:
This is the GamesCom 2010 trailer for Invizimals Shadow Zone on the Sony PlayStation Portable (PSP)
This game uses a camera on the PSP along with cards to create augmented reality creatures in the real world to battle against - in either single or 2 player games.
